00007 static int stbi__dds_test(stbi__context *s)
00008 {
00009         //      check the magic number
00010         if (stbi__get8(s) != 'D') {
00011                 stbi__rewind(s);
00012                 return 0;
00013         }
00014 
00015         if (stbi__get8(s) != 'D') {
00016                 stbi__rewind(s);
00017                 return 0;
00018         }
00019 
00020         if (stbi__get8(s) != 'S') {
00021                 stbi__rewind(s);
00022                 return 0;
00023         }
00024 
00025         if (stbi__get8(s) != ' ') {
00026                 stbi__rewind(s);
00027                 return 0;
00028         }
00029 
00030         //      check header size
00031         if (stbi__get32le(s) != 124) {
00032                 stbi__rewind(s);
00033                 return 0;
00034         }
00035 
00036         // Also rewind because the loader needs to read the header
00037         stbi__rewind(s);
00038 
00039         return 1;
00040 }

00043 int      stbi__dds_test_filename                        (char const *filename)
00044 {
00045    int r;
00046    FILE *f = fopen(filename, "rb");
00047    if (!f) return 0;
00048    r = stbi__dds_test_file(f);
00049    fclose(f);
00050    return r;
00051 }
00052 
00053 int      stbi__dds_test_file        (FILE *f)
00054 {
00055    stbi__context s;
00056    int r,n = ftell(f);
00057    stbi__start_file(&s,f);
00058    r = stbi__dds_test(&s);
00059    fseek(f,n,SEEK_SET);
00060    return r;
00061 }
00062 #endif

00064 int      stbi__dds_test_memory      (stbi_uc const *buffer, int len)
00065 {
00066    stbi__context s;
00067    stbi__start_mem(&s,buffer, len);
00068    return stbi__dds_test(&s);

00072 {

00074    stbi__start_callbacks(&s, (stbi_io_callbacks *) clbk, user);

00078 //      helper functions
00079 int stbi_convert_bit_range( int c, int from_bits, int to_bits )
00080 {
00081         int b = (1 << (from_bits - 1)) + c * ((1 << to_bits) - 1);
00082         return (b + (b >> from_bits)) >> from_bits;
00083 }
00084 void stbi_rgb_888_from_565( unsigned int c, int *r, int *g, int *b )
00085 {
00086         *r = stbi_convert_bit_range( (c >> 11) & 31, 5, 8 );
00087         *g = stbi_convert_bit_range( (c >> 05) & 63, 6, 8 );
00088         *b = stbi_convert_bit_range( (c >> 00) & 31, 5, 8 );
00089 }
00090 void stbi_decode_DXT1_block(
00091                         unsigned char uncompressed[16*4],
00092                         unsigned char compressed[8] )
00093 {
00094         int next_bit = 4*8;
00095         int i, r, g, b;
00096         int c0, c1;
00097         unsigned char decode_colors[4*4];
00098         //      find the 2 primary colors
00099         c0 = compressed[0] + (compressed[1] << 8);
00100         c1 = compressed[2] + (compressed[3] << 8);
00101         stbi_rgb_888_from_565( c0, &r, &g, &b );
00102         decode_colors[0] = r;
00103         decode_colors[1] = g;
00104         decode_colors[2] = b;
00105         decode_colors[3] = 255;
00106         stbi_rgb_888_from_565( c1, &r, &g, &b );
00107         decode_colors[4] = r;
00108         decode_colors[5] = g;
00109         decode_colors[6] = b;
00110         decode_colors[7] = 255;
00111         if( c0 > c1 )
00112         {
00113                 //      no alpha, 2 interpolated colors
00114                 decode_colors[8] = (2*decode_colors[0] + decode_colors[4]) / 3;
00115                 decode_colors[9] = (2*decode_colors[1] + decode_colors[5]) / 3;
00116                 decode_colors[10] = (2*decode_colors[2] + decode_colors[6]) / 3;
00117                 decode_colors[11] = 255;
00118                 decode_colors[12] = (decode_colors[0] + 2*decode_colors[4]) / 3;
00119                 decode_colors[13] = (decode_colors[1] + 2*decode_colors[5]) / 3;
00120                 decode_colors[14] = (decode_colors[2] + 2*decode_colors[6]) / 3;
00121                 decode_colors[15] = 255;
00122         } else
00123         {
00124                 //      1 interpolated color, alpha
00125                 decode_colors[8] = (decode_colors[0] + decode_colors[4]) / 2;
00126                 decode_colors[9] = (decode_colors[1] + decode_colors[5]) / 2;
00127                 decode_colors[10] = (decode_colors[2] + decode_colors[6]) / 2;
00128                 decode_colors[11] = 255;
00129                 decode_colors[12] = 0;
00130                 decode_colors[13] = 0;
00131                 decode_colors[14] = 0;
00132                 decode_colors[15] = 0;
00133         }
00134         //      decode the block
00135         for( i = 0; i < 16*4; i += 4 )
00136         {
00137                 int idx = ((compressed[next_bit>>3] >> (next_bit & 7)) & 3) * 4;
00138                 next_bit += 2;
00139                 uncompressed[i+0] = decode_colors[idx+0];
00140                 uncompressed[i+1] = decode_colors[idx+1];
00141                 uncompressed[i+2] = decode_colors[idx+2];
00142                 uncompressed[i+3] = decode_colors[idx+3];
00143         }
00144         //      done
00145 }
00146 void stbi_decode_DXT23_alpha_block(
00147                         unsigned char uncompressed[16*4],
00148                         unsigned char compressed[8] )
00149 {
00150         int i, next_bit = 0;
00151         //      each alpha value gets 4 bits
00152         for( i = 3; i < 16*4; i += 4 )
00153         {
00154                 uncompressed[i] = stbi_convert_bit_range(
00155                                 (compressed[next_bit>>3] >> (next_bit&7)) & 15,
00156                                 4, 8 );
00157                 next_bit += 4;
00158         }
00159 }
00160 void stbi_decode_DXT45_alpha_block(
00161                         unsigned char uncompressed[16*4],
00162                         unsigned char compressed[8] )
00163 {
00164         int i, next_bit = 8*2;
00165         unsigned char decode_alpha[8];
00166         //      each alpha value gets 3 bits, and the 1st 2 bytes are the range
00167         decode_alpha[0] = compressed[0];
00168         decode_alpha[1] = compressed[1];
00169         if( decode_alpha[0] > decode_alpha[1] )
00170         {
00171                 //      6 step intermediate
00172                 decode_alpha[2] = (6*decode_alpha[0] + 1*decode_alpha[1]) / 7;
00173                 decode_alpha[3] = (5*decode_alpha[0] + 2*decode_alpha[1]) / 7;
00174                 decode_alpha[4] = (4*decode_alpha[0] + 3*decode_alpha[1]) / 7;
00175                 decode_alpha[5] = (3*decode_alpha[0] + 4*decode_alpha[1]) / 7;
00176                 decode_alpha[6] = (2*decode_alpha[0] + 5*decode_alpha[1]) / 7;
00177                 decode_alpha[7] = (1*decode_alpha[0] + 6*decode_alpha[1]) / 7;
00178         } else
00179         {
00180                 //      4 step intermediate, pluss full and none
00181                 decode_alpha[2] = (4*decode_alpha[0] + 1*decode_alpha[1]) / 5;
00182                 decode_alpha[3] = (3*decode_alpha[0] + 2*decode_alpha[1]) / 5;
00183                 decode_alpha[4] = (2*decode_alpha[0] + 3*decode_alpha[1]) / 5;
00184                 decode_alpha[5] = (1*decode_alpha[0] + 4*decode_alpha[1]) / 5;
00185                 decode_alpha[6] = 0;
00186                 decode_alpha[7] = 255;
00187         }
00188         for( i = 3; i < 16*4; i += 4 )
00189         {
00190                 int idx = 0, bit;
00191                 bit = (compressed[next_bit>>3] >> (next_bit&7)) & 1;
00192                 idx += bit << 0;
00193                 ++next_bit;
00194                 bit = (compressed[next_bit>>3] >> (next_bit&7)) & 1;
00195                 idx += bit << 1;
00196                 ++next_bit;
00197                 bit = (compressed[next_bit>>3] >> (next_bit&7)) & 1;
00198                 idx += bit << 2;
00199                 ++next_bit;
00200                 uncompressed[i] = decode_alpha[idx & 7];
00201         }
00202         //      done
00203 }
00204 void stbi_decode_DXT_color_block(
00205                         unsigned char uncompressed[16*4],
00206                         unsigned char compressed[8] )
00207 {
00208         int next_bit = 4*8;
00209         int i, r, g, b;
00210         int c0, c1;
00211         unsigned char decode_colors[4*3];
00212         //      find the 2 primary colors
00213         c0 = compressed[0] + (compressed[1] << 8);
00214         c1 = compressed[2] + (compressed[3] << 8);
00215         stbi_rgb_888_from_565( c0, &r, &g, &b );
00216         decode_colors[0] = r;
00217         decode_colors[1] = g;
00218         decode_colors[2] = b;
00219         stbi_rgb_888_from_565( c1, &r, &g, &b );
00220         decode_colors[3] = r;
00221         decode_colors[4] = g;
00222         decode_colors[5] = b;
00223         //      Like DXT1, but no choicees:
00224         //      no alpha, 2 interpolated colors
00225         decode_colors[6] = (2*decode_colors[0] + decode_colors[3]) / 3;
00226         decode_colors[7] = (2*decode_colors[1] + decode_colors[4]) / 3;
00227         decode_colors[8] = (2*decode_colors[2] + decode_colors[5]) / 3;
00228         decode_colors[9] = (decode_colors[0] + 2*decode_colors[3]) / 3;
00229         decode_colors[10] = (decode_colors[1] + 2*decode_colors[4]) / 3;
00230         decode_colors[11] = (decode_colors[2] + 2*decode_colors[5]) / 3;
00231         //      decode the block
00232         for( i = 0; i < 16*4; i += 4 )
00233         {
00234                 int idx = ((compressed[next_bit>>3] >> (next_bit & 7)) & 3) * 3;
00235                 next_bit += 2;
00236                 uncompressed[i+0] = decode_colors[idx+0];
00237                 uncompressed[i+1] = decode_colors[idx+1];
00238                 uncompressed[i+2] = decode_colors[idx+2];
00239         }
00240         //      done
00241 }

00243 static int stbi__dds_info( stbi__context *s, int *x, int *y, int *comp, int *iscompressed ) {
00244         int flags,is_compressed,has_alpha;
00245         DDS_header header={0};
00246 
00247         if( sizeof( DDS_header ) != 128 )
00248         {
00249                 return 0;
00250         }
00251 
00252         stbi__getn( s, (stbi_uc*)(&header), 128 );
00253 
00254         if( header.dwMagic != (('D' << 0) | ('D' << 8) | ('S' << 16) | (' ' << 24)) ) {
00255            stbi__rewind( s );
00256            return 0;
00257         }
00258         if( header.dwSize != 124 ) {
00259            stbi__rewind( s );
00260            return 0;
00261         }
00262         flags = DDSD_CAPS | DDSD_HEIGHT | DDSD_WIDTH | DDSD_PIXELFORMAT;
00263         if( (header.dwFlags & flags) != flags ) {
00264            stbi__rewind( s );
00265            return 0;
00266         }
00267         if( header.sPixelFormat.dwSize != 32 ) {
00268            stbi__rewind( s );
00269            return 0;
00270         }
00271         flags = DDPF_FOURCC | DDPF_RGB;
00272         if( (header.sPixelFormat.dwFlags & flags) == 0 ) {
00273            stbi__rewind( s );
00274            return 0;
00275         }
00276         if( (header.sCaps.dwCaps1 & DDSCAPS_TEXTURE) == 0 ) {
00277            stbi__rewind( s );
00278            return 0;
00279         }
00280 
00281         is_compressed = (header.sPixelFormat.dwFlags & DDPF_FOURCC) / DDPF_FOURCC;
00282         has_alpha = (header.sPixelFormat.dwFlags & DDPF_ALPHAPIXELS) / DDPF_ALPHAPIXELS;
00283 
00284         *x = header.dwWidth;
00285         *y = header.dwHeight;
00286 
00287         if ( !is_compressed ) {
00288                 *comp = 3;
00289 
00290                 if ( has_alpha )
00291                         *comp = 4;
00292         }
00293         else
00294                 *comp = 4;
00295 
00296         if ( iscompressed )
00297                 *iscompressed = is_compressed;
00298 
00299         return 1;
00300 }

00302 int stbi__dds_info_from_memory (stbi_uc const *buffer, int len, int *x, int *y, int *comp, int *iscompressed)
00303 {
00304         stbi__context s;
00305         stbi__start_mem(&s,buffer, len);
00306         return stbi__dds_info( &s, x, y, comp, iscompressed );
00307 }

00318 {
00319    int res;
00320    FILE *f = fopen(filename, "rb");
00321    if (!f) return 0;
00322    res = stbi__dds_info_from_file( f, x, y, comp, iscompressed );

00327 int stbi__dds_info_from_file(FILE *f,                  int *x, int *y, int *comp, int *iscompressed)
00328 {

00330    int res;

00332    stbi__start_file(&s, f);
00333    res = stbi__dds_info(&s, x, y, comp, iscompressed);
00334    fseek(f, n, SEEK_SET);

00339 static void * stbi__dds_load(stbi__context *s, int *x, int *y, int *comp, int req_comp)
00340 {
00341         //      all variables go up front
00342         stbi_uc *dds_data = NULL;
00343         stbi_uc block[16*4];
00344         stbi_uc compressed[8];
00345         int flags, DXT_family;
00346         int has_alpha, has_mipmap;
00347         int is_compressed, cubemap_faces;
00348         int block_pitch, num_blocks;
00349         DDS_header header={0};
00350         int i, sz, cf;
00351         //      load the header
00352         if( sizeof( DDS_header ) != 128 )
00353         {
00354                 return NULL;
00355         }
00356         stbi__getn( s, (stbi_uc*)(&header), 128 );
00357         //      and do some checking
00358         if( header.dwMagic != (('D' << 0) | ('D' << 8) | ('S' << 16) | (' ' << 24)) ) return NULL;
00359         if( header.dwSize != 124 ) return NULL;
00360         flags = DDSD_CAPS | DDSD_HEIGHT | DDSD_WIDTH | DDSD_PIXELFORMAT;
00361         if( (header.dwFlags & flags) != flags ) return NULL;
00362         /*      According to the MSDN spec, the dwFlags should contain
00363                 DDSD_LINEARSIZE if it's compressed, or DDSD_PITCH if
00364                 uncompressed.  Some DDS writers do not conform to the
00365                 spec, so I need to make my reader more tolerant */
00366         if( header.sPixelFormat.dwSize != 32 ) return NULL;
00367         flags = DDPF_FOURCC | DDPF_RGB;
00368         if( (header.sPixelFormat.dwFlags & flags) == 0 ) return NULL;
00369         if( (header.sCaps.dwCaps1 & DDSCAPS_TEXTURE) == 0 ) return NULL;
00370         //      get the image data
00371         s->img_x = header.dwWidth;
00372         s->img_y = header.dwHeight;
00373         s->img_n = 4;
00374         is_compressed = (header.sPixelFormat.dwFlags & DDPF_FOURCC) / DDPF_FOURCC;
00375         has_alpha = (header.sPixelFormat.dwFlags & DDPF_ALPHAPIXELS) / DDPF_ALPHAPIXELS;
00376         has_mipmap = (header.sCaps.dwCaps1 & DDSCAPS_MIPMAP) && (header.dwMipMapCount > 1);
00377         cubemap_faces = (header.sCaps.dwCaps2 & DDSCAPS2_CUBEMAP) / DDSCAPS2_CUBEMAP;
00378         /*      I need cubemaps to have square faces    */
00379         cubemap_faces &= (s->img_x == s->img_y);
00380         cubemap_faces *= 5;
00381         cubemap_faces += 1;
00382         block_pitch = (s->img_x+3) >> 2;
00383         num_blocks = block_pitch * ((s->img_y+3) >> 2);
00384         /*      let the user know what's going on       */
00385         *x = s->img_x;
00386         *y = s->img_y;
00387         *comp = s->img_n;
00388         /*      is this uncompressed?   */
00389         if( is_compressed )
00390         {
00391                 /*      compressed      */
00392                 //      note: header.sPixelFormat.dwFourCC is something like (('D'<<0)|('X'<<8)|('T'<<16)|('1'<<24))
00393                 DXT_family = 1 + (header.sPixelFormat.dwFourCC >> 24) - '1';
00394                 if( (DXT_family < 1) || (DXT_family > 5) ) return NULL;
00395                 /*      check the expected size...oops, nevermind...
00396                         those non-compliant writers leave
00397                         dwPitchOrLinearSize == 0        */
00398                 //      passed all the tests, get the RAM for decoding
00399                 sz = (s->img_x)*(s->img_y)*4*cubemap_faces;
00400                 dds_data = (unsigned char*)malloc( sz );
00401                 /*      do this once for each face      */
00402                 for( cf = 0; cf < cubemap_faces; ++ cf )
00403                 {
00404                         //      now read and decode all the blocks
00405                         for( i = 0; i < num_blocks; ++i )
00406                         {
00407                                 //      where are we?
00408                                 int bx, by, bw=4, bh=4;
00409                                 int ref_x = 4 * (i % block_pitch);
00410                                 int ref_y = 4 * (i / block_pitch);
00411                                 //      get the next block's worth of compressed data, and decompress it
00412                                 if( DXT_family == 1 )
00413                                 {
00414                                         //      DXT1
00415                                         stbi__getn( s, compressed, 8 );
00416                                         stbi_decode_DXT1_block( block, compressed );
00417                                 } else if( DXT_family < 4 )
00418                                 {
00419                                         //      DXT2/3
00420                                         stbi__getn( s, compressed, 8 );
00421                                         stbi_decode_DXT23_alpha_block ( block, compressed );
00422                                         stbi__getn( s, compressed, 8 );
00423                                         stbi_decode_DXT_color_block ( block, compressed );
00424                                 } else
00425                                 {
00426                                         //      DXT4/5
00427                                         stbi__getn( s, compressed, 8 );
00428                                         stbi_decode_DXT45_alpha_block ( block, compressed );
00429                                         stbi__getn( s, compressed, 8 );
00430                                         stbi_decode_DXT_color_block ( block, compressed );
00431                                 }
00432                                 //      is this a partial block?
00433                                 if( ref_x + 4 > (int)s->img_x )
00434                                 {
00435                                         bw = s->img_x - ref_x;
00436                                 }
00437                                 if( ref_y + 4 > (int)s->img_y )
00438                                 {
00439                                         bh = s->img_y - ref_y;
00440                                 }
00441                                 //      now drop our decompressed data into the buffer
00442                                 for( by = 0; by < bh; ++by )
00443                                 {
00444                                         int idx = 4*((ref_y+by+cf*s->img_x)*s->img_x + ref_x);
00445                                         for( bx = 0; bx < bw*4; ++bx )
00446                                         {
00447 
00448                                                 dds_data[idx+bx] = block[by*16+bx];
00449                                         }
00450                                 }
00451                         }
00452                         /*      done reading and decoding the main image...
00453                                 stbi__skip MIPmaps if present   */
00454                         if( has_mipmap )
00455                         {
00456                                 int block_size = 16;
00457                                 if( DXT_family == 1 )
00458                                 {
00459                                         block_size = 8;
00460                                 }
00461                                 for( i = 1; i < (int)header.dwMipMapCount; ++i )
00462                                 {
00463                                         int mx = s->img_x >> (i + 2);
00464                                         int my = s->img_y >> (i + 2);
00465                                         if( mx < 1 )
00466                                         {
00467                                                 mx = 1;
00468                                         }
00469                                         if( my < 1 )
00470                                         {
00471                                                 my = 1;
00472                                         }
00473                                         stbi__skip( s, mx*my*block_size );
00474                                 }
00475                         }
00476                 }/* per cubemap face */
00477         } else
00478         {
00479                 /*      uncompressed    */
00480                 DXT_family = 0;
00481                 s->img_n = 3;
00482                 if( has_alpha )
00483                 {
00484                         s->img_n = 4;
00485                 }
00486                 *comp = s->img_n;
00487                 sz = s->img_x*s->img_y*s->img_n*cubemap_faces;
00488                 dds_data = (unsigned char*)malloc( sz );
00489                 /*      do this once for each face      */
00490                 for( cf = 0; cf < cubemap_faces; ++ cf )
00491                 {
00492                         /*      read the main image for this face       */
00493                         stbi__getn( s, &dds_data[cf*s->img_x*s->img_y*s->img_n], s->img_x*s->img_y*s->img_n );
00494                         /*      done reading and decoding the main image...
00495                                 stbi__skip MIPmaps if present   */
00496                         if( has_mipmap )
00497                         {
00498                                 for( i = 1; i < (int)header.dwMipMapCount; ++i )
00499                                 {
00500                                         int mx = s->img_x >> i;
00501                                         int my = s->img_y >> i;
00502                                         if( mx < 1 )
00503                                         {
00504                                                 mx = 1;
00505                                         }
00506                                         if( my < 1 )
00507                                         {
00508                                                 my = 1;
00509                                         }
00510                                         stbi__skip( s, mx*my*s->img_n );
00511                                 }
00512                         }
00513                 }
00514                 /*      data was BGR, I need it RGB     */
00515                 for( i = 0; i < sz; i += s->img_n )
00516                 {
00517                         unsigned char temp = dds_data[i];
00518                         dds_data[i] = dds_data[i+2];
00519                         dds_data[i+2] = temp;
00520                 }
00521         }
00522         /*      finished decompressing into RGBA,
00523                 adjust the y size if we have a cubemap
00524                 note: sz is already up to date  */
00525         s->img_y *= cubemap_faces;
00526         *y = s->img_y;
00527         //      did the user want something else, or
00528         //      see if all the alpha values are 255 (i.e. no transparency)
00529         has_alpha = 0;
00530         if( s->img_n == 4)
00531         {
00532                 for( i = 3; (i < sz) && (has_alpha == 0); i += 4 )
00533                 {
00534                         has_alpha |= (dds_data[i] < 255);
00535                 }
00536         }
00537         if( (req_comp <= 4) && (req_comp >= 1) )
00538         {
00539                 //      user has some requirements, meet them
00540                 if( req_comp != s->img_n )
00541                 {
00542                         dds_data = stbi__convert_format( dds_data, s->img_n, req_comp, s->img_x, s->img_y );
00543                         *comp = req_comp;
00544                 }
00545         } else
00546         {
00547                 //      user had no requirements, only drop to RGB is no alpha
00548                 if( (has_alpha == 0) && (s->img_n == 4) )
00549                 {
00550                         dds_data = stbi__convert_format( dds_data, 4, 3, s->img_x, s->img_y );
00551                         *comp = 3;
00552                 }
00553         }
00554         //      OK, done
00555         return dds_data;
00556 }
00557 
00558 #ifndef STBI_NO_STDIO
00559 void *stbi__dds_load_from_file   (FILE *f,                  int *x, int *y, int *comp, int req_comp)
00560 {
00561         stbi__context s;
00562         stbi__start_file(&s,f);
00563         return stbi__dds_load(&s,x,y,comp,req_comp);
00564 }
00565 
00566 void *stbi__dds_load_from_path             (const char *filename,           int *x, int *y, int *comp, int req_comp)
00567 {
00568    void *data;
00569    FILE *f = fopen(filename, "rb");
00570    if (!f) return NULL;
00571    data = stbi__dds_load_from_file(f,x,y,comp,req_comp);
00572    fclose(f);
00573    return data;
00574 }
00575 #endif
00576 
00577 void *stbi__dds_load_from_memory (stbi_uc const *buffer, int len, int *x, int *y, int *comp, int req_comp)
00578 {
00579         stbi__context s;
00580    stbi__start_mem(&s,buffer, len);
00581    return stbi__dds_load(&s,x,y,comp,req_comp);
00582 }
00583 
00584 void *stbi__dds_load_from_callbacks (stbi_io_callbacks const *clbk, void *user, int *x, int *y, int *comp, int req_comp)
00585 {
00586         stbi__context s;
00587    stbi__start_callbacks(&s, (stbi_io_callbacks *) clbk, user);
00588    return stbi__dds_load(&s,x,y,comp,req_comp);
00589 }
